rows.label: qst630101_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmmm... If I tweak
this bit like that...

rows.label: qst630101_msg0002
rows.name: ...then this bit'll go like this...

rows.label: qst630101_msg0003
rows.name: Yeah! That's the one! I'm a genius!

rows.label: qst630101_msg0004
rows.name: Huh? Who are you lot?

rows.label: qst630101_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, is that right? Figures why I
wouldn't recognize you, then.

rows.label: qst630101_msg0006
rows.name: They call me Silvio.

rows.label: qst630101_msg0007
rows.name:
Used to be a smith before I retired,
but I still whip up accessories from
time to time, for the fun of it.

rows.label: qst630101_msg0008
rows.name:
I leave all the buying, selling,
wheeling and dealing side of
things to the youngsters.

rows.label: qst630101_msg0009
rows.name: Oh, but what am I doing?!

rows.label: qst630101_msg0010
rows.name:
I almost clean forgot about the
brilliant idea I just had!

rows.label: qst630101_msg0011
rows.name:
Okay, listen up then... I
just came up with an idea
for a new accessory.

rows.label: qst630101_msg0012
rows.name:
When it's complete, it'll
be the first of its kind!

rows.label: qst630101_msg0013
rows.name:
But I'm, uh, a bit short on some
of the things I need for it.

rows.label: qst630101_msg0014
rows.name:
Maybe you could go
gather 'em up for me?

rows.label: qst630101_msg0015
rows.name:
If you do, I'll let you
have the final product
for free once it's done!

rows.label: qst630101_msg0016
rows.name:
I'm not in this for the profit
anyhow. I just really love making
things. So, how's about it?

rows.label: qst630101_msg0017
rows.name:
Oh! You'll help me out,
will ya? Thanks a bunch!

rows.label: qst630101_msg0018
rows.name:
Good to see there's still a few
enterprising youngsters out there!

rows.label: qst630101_msg0019
rows.name:
Now, the materials I need
are a Jungle Frame, a Pione
Stone, and a Volff Fang.

rows.label: qst630101_msg0020
rows.name:
Jungle Frames are mostly found in
Gula, I hear. You find them when
salvaging from time to time.

rows.label: qst630101_msg0021
rows.name:
And you shouldn't have any trouble
finding Pione Stones if you check
the rocky corners of Invidia.

rows.label: qst630101_msg0022
rows.name:
As for the Volff Fang, you can
get one by defeating Rip Volff
around Drillbore Bridge.

rows.label: qst630101_msg0023
rows.name: Good luck with all that!

rows.label: qst630101_msg0101
rows.name:
I'll wait here for as long as
it takes you. Well, or till I
die. Nobody lives forever!
